alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:23PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Russell and Barton Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 723 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gorham to Shaffer. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Great Bend, Russell, Hoisington, Ellinwood, Claflin, Gorham, Dorrance, Albert, Olmitz, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Galatia, Susank, Russell Airport, Cheyenne Bottoms, Wilson Lake and Odin. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 176 and 201. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
